Posts.Content:
Hi everyone, I went for my yearly mammogram on thursday and got a call from my dr on monday saying I have to have a follow up with a specialist. I suffer from panic attacks so I had little sleep. I see the specialist tomorrow ( Wed) and thanks to joining this forum I feel a bit relieved that I am not alone. Also I am demanding for a biopsy. Thanks for all your comments regarding breast cancer. God Bless U all.
GiGi
Posts.Title: Please help. Found lump. Am terrified!!!

Posts.Content: Hi I just got back from the drs and was told they found a mass on my left lower inner breast. They have to do a biopsy in a month. I am 48 years old and breast cancer runs in the family. Is anyone going through the same thing?
Posts.Title: Breast Cancer
